## Problem 1

Read & clean the Mr. Trash Wheel sheet
```{r}
trash_df <- 
  read_excel(
    "data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
    sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
    range = "A2:N408") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(is.na(dumpster) == FALSE) %>% 
  mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls))
```
